text: 3.18: Ro 4.14; 8.17; 11.6Nza maaŋ muuŋgip, Fhe Bakɨme nzan nɨɨn zav nzan mbuigi bigi, nza Moses suaŋgi tɨvi zɨn ŋgɨp, nta ndirga. Nza mba Fhe Bakɨme nɨɨn zav nza suaŋgi tuavar mba bigi ndi fhuvara. Nza khueŋ mbugu kaŋgiri, Fhe Bakɨme mba bigir Abrahaman nɨɨn za suaŋgiap, ana maamgiap, ana ndɨɨi.
